checks.label: deploy target server is configured
checks.hint: Set WEBSITE_DEPLOY_SERVER or pass --server at deploy time.

checks.label: deploy SSH port is valid
checks.hint: Set WEBSITE_DEPLOY_PORT to an integer between 1 and 65535.

checks.label: deploy SSH key exists
checks.hint: Set WEBSITE_DEPLOY_KEY to a valid private key path.

checks.label: remote deploy path is configured
checks.hint: Set WEBSITE_DEPLOY_REMOTE_PATH when changing remote location.

checks.label: firebase web api key is configured or resolvable
checks.detail: Firebase web API key source: env.
checks.hint: Set VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY, PORTAL_FIREBASE_API_KEY, or FIREBASE_WEB_API_KEY, or ensure firebase-tools access to apps:sdkconfig.

checks.label: promotion gate staff email is present
promotion gate staff password is present
promotion gate Firestore Rules API token is present
checks.hint: Set FIREBASE_RULES_API_TOKEN for backend regression/rules checks.

checks.label: promotion gate Firestore index deploy auth is configured
checks.detail: Index deploy auth detected via FIREBASE_TOKEN, GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS, service-account JSON, or local Firebase CLI session.
checks.hint: Set FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_MONSOONFIRE_PORTAL (recommended), FIREBASE_TOKEN, or ensure local Firebase CLI login before deploy.

checks.label: agent staff credentials path exists
checks.hint: Set PORTAL_AGENT_STAFF_CREDENTIALS to a readable JSON credentials file.

checks.label: agent staff credential file content is valid
checks.detail: Credential payload is parseable and complete.
checks.hint: Credential file must contain refreshToken, uid, and email.

ware check-in page loads without check-in/index errors
